Module io.inverno.mod.web

Package io.inverno.mod.web

package io.inverno.mod.web

Inverno Web API and module configuration.

  • Interface Summary
    Interface
    Description
    AcceptAwareRoute<A extends Exchange>
    A route that specifies criteria used to determine whether the resource served by the route can produce a response which is acceptable to the client.
    ContentAwareRoute<A extends Exchange>
    A route that specifies criteria used to determine whether the resource served by the route can process a request based on its content type.
    ErrorAwareRoute<A extends Exchange>
    A route that specifies criteria used to determine whether the resource served by the route can process a request that failed with a particular type of error.
    ErrorWebExchange<A extends Throwable>
    An error exchange that extends the HTTP server ErrorExchange with features for the Web.
    ErrorWebExchangeHandler<A extends Throwable>
    An error exchange handler used to handle ErrorWebExchange.
    ErrorWebRoute
    An error web route specifies criteria used to determine the error web exchange handler to execute to handle a failing request.
    ErrorWebRouteManager
    An error web route manager is used to manage the routes of an error web router.
    ErrorWebRouter
    An error web router is used to handle failing requests for which an error was thrown during the initial processing.
    ErrorWebRouterConfigurer
    A configurer used to configure an error web router.
    MethodAwareRoute<A extends Exchange>
    A route that specifies criteria used to determine whether the resource served by the route can process a request based on its HTTP method.
    PathAwareRoute<A extends Exchange>
    A route that specifies criteria used to determine whether the resource served by the route can process a request based on its absolute path.
    PathParameters
    Represents the path parameters extracted from the absolute path of a request following the URIPattern used to define the route to the targeted resource.
    RequestDataDecoder<A>
    A request payload consumer used to decode the payload to a single object or many objects.
    ResponseDataEncoder<A>
    A response payload producer used to encode the payload from a single object or many objects.
    Route<A extends Exchange>
    Base route interface.
    RouteManager<A extends Exchange,​B extends Router<A,​B,​C,​D,​E>,​C extends RouteManager<A,​B,​C,​D,​E>,​D extends Route<A>,​E extends Exchange>
    Base route manager interface.
    Router<A extends Exchange,​B extends Router<A,​B,​C,​D,​E>,​C extends RouteManager<A,​B,​C,​D,​E>,​D extends Route<A>,​E extends Exchange>
    Base router interface.
    RouterConfigurer<A extends Exchange,​B extends Router<A,​B,​C,​D,​E>,​C extends RouteManager<A,​B,​C,​D,​E>,​D extends Route<A>,​E extends Exchange>
    Base router configurer interface.
    WebConfiguration
    Web module configuration.
    WebExchange
    An exchange that extends the HTTP server Exchange with features for the Web.
    WebExchangeHandler<A extends WebExchange>
    An exchange handler used to handle WebExchange.
    WebPart
    A part with payload decoding support.
    WebRequest
    A request with supports for path parameters and body decoding based on the request content type.
    WebRequestBody
    A request body with payload decoding support.
    WebRequestBody.WebMultipart
    A multipart/form-data consumer with payload decoding support.
    WebResponse
    A request with supports for body encoding based on the response content type.
    WebResponseBody
    A response body with payload encoding support.
    WebResponseBody.SseEncoder<A>
    A server-sent events data producer used to encode data from a single object or many objects.
    WebResponseBody.SseEncoder.Event<A>
    A server-sent event with data encoding support.
    WebResponseBody.SseEncoder.EventFactory<A>
    A server-sent events factory with data encoding support.
    WebRoute<A extends WebExchange>
    A web route specifies criteria used to determine the web exchange handler to execute to handle a request.
    WebRouteManager<A extends WebExchange>
    A web route manager is used to manage the routes of an web router.
    WebRouter<A extends WebExchange>
    A web router is used to handle HTTP requests.
    WebRouterConfigurer<A extends WebExchange>
    A configurer used to configure a web router.

  • Exception Summary
    Exception
    Description
    MissingRequiredParameterException
    Thrown to indicates that a required parameter is missing to process the request.
